title: 14g Bypass Americano
preparation_steps: Prepare a separate cup with 100g hot water (bypass).

brewing_steps.audio_script: Pour just 100 grams of water. Stir continuously for 20 seconds. We are making a very strong concentrate here, so we need high agitation.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Vierte solo 100 gramos de agua. Revuelve continuamente durante 20 segundos. Estamos haciendo un concentrado muy fuerte, así que necesitamos mucha agitación.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Insert the plunger and let it sit for 30 seconds. The fine grind extracts quickly.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Inserta el émbolo y deja reposar 30 segundos. La molienda fina extrae rápidamente.

brewing_steps.instruction: Press firmly into cup with bypass water.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Press firmly into your mug that already contains the bypass water. This mixes the strong concentrate with the fresh hot water, opening up the flavors beautifully.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Presiona firmemente en la taza con el agua de bypass.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Presiona firmemente en tu taza que ya contiene el agua de bypass. Esto mezcla el concentrado fuerte con el agua caliente fresca, abriendo los sabores maravillosamente.

what_to_expect.description: The 'Bypass' method involves brewing a strong concentrate and then adding water directly to the final cup. This mimics an Americano and often produces a cleaner, sweeter cup because you aren't forcing all the water through the grounds, which can extract bitterness.
what_to_expect.audio_script: This recipe uses the bypass technique. By brewing a strong concentrate with only half the water, and then adding fresh water to the cup, we avoid over-extracting the bitter compounds that come out at the end of a long brew. The result is a smooth, sweet, Americano-style coffee.
what_to_expect.description_es: Un Americano casero usando la técnica de bypass. El concentrado diluido produce una taza limpia y equilibrada con el volumen de un café filtrado tradicional.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Esta receta crea un Americano casero. Primero extraemos un concentrado, luego lo diluimos con agua caliente. El resultado es una taza limpia con el volumen de un café filtrado normal.

notes: You can adjust the amount of bypass water to taste (stronger or weaker).
notes_es: Produce un concentrado que se diluye con agua caliente, similar a un Americano.
preparation_steps_es: Muele 14g de café a molienda fina.
Ten 100g de agua caliente adicional lista para el bypass.
